replies.body: NA>CH>KR>SEA>BR>EU
USA >

Lustboy = Korean, Santorin & Bjergsen = Danish, WildTurtle = Canadian, With Dyrus being the only American on the team, it's hellaciously unwise to claim that. We Americans get a bad enough rap as it is, without people making silly claims like this. Don't get me wrong TSM is the best team NA, and for now the world, but they are almost as far as you can get from being a USA>All team.

> [{quoted}](name=FeloniousQ,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=zKQAmG7d,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-03-15T22:36:00.549+0000)
>
> Lustboy = Korean, Santorin & Bjergsen = Danish, WildTurtle = Canadian, With Dyrus being the only American on the team, it's hellaciously unwise to claim that. We Americans get a bad enough rap as it is, without people making silly claims like this. Don't get me wrong TSM is the best team NA, and for now the world, but they are almost as far as you can get from being a USA>All team.

True. I don't dispute TSM being an NA team but there's nothing to do with the USA there. Using TSM to talk about the greatness of the USA is ridiculously self-centric. They're just as Canadian as they are American.

LOL, dude really canadian? who gives a shit him and dyrus have been with the team since the begining and bjerg was a bench for quite a while. They are winning cause of they're teamwork not because they have 2 danish men and a korean on they're team so stfu.

SINCE THE BEGINNING!?!?!

Chaox, Oddone, TheRainMan would like a word with you. TROLOLO.

You do realize that NA is made up of about 95% immigrants right? All whites, blacks, and asians that make up 95% of America are immigrants. TSM is the most American team. Your logic is flawed to shit.
95% of NA's population immigrated here? So only 5% of the population are natural born citizens? Check your logic...I think there's a flaw...
According to U.S. Census Bureau in 2013, there were roughly 5.2 million American Indians and Alaska Natives living in the U.S., representing approximately 2% of the U.S. total population.

http://www.merriam-webster.com/dictionary/immigrant

Full Definition of IMMIGRANT

:  one that immigrates: as
a :  a person who comes to a country to take up permanent residence
b :  a plant or animal that becomes established in an area where it was previously unknown

I'm a natural born citizen...I did not immigrate...same as many other North Americans...cool fun fact bro
You do realize Canada is in North America...right? NA= North America...It's NA LCS not USA LCS...

> [{quoted}](name=FeloniousQ,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=zKQAmG7d,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-03-15T22:36:00.549+0000)

We Americans get a bad enough rap as it is, without people making silly claims like this. Don't get me wrong TSM is the best team NA, and for now the world, but they are almost as far as you can get from being a USA>All team.

Oh shut up.
Why?

1. it's not a silly *claim*, it's a silly *comment*; as in, clearly not meant to be taken seriously.

2. Isn't America built on essentially importing people from other countries, gathering the best talent in the world? So basically TSM is the PERFECT representation of the American melting pot.

> [{quoted}](name=FeloniousQ,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=zKQAmG7d,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-03-15T22:36:00.549+0000)

I know. We need more white people to show the world that we really are the best at everything, including video games.

NA's top team > CH's 12TH team... since this worst team in CH has won the Top 2 teams in KR... So this will only proved TSM has become one of the best teams in the world and EU SUCKS. I wish we could see TSM vs SKT TSM vs GET TSM vs EDG TSM vs CJ TSM vs OMG(or any other top LPL, LCK teams) in the mid-season invitation.
TSM Beat CJ in Katowice.
I think its funny people think wild turtle, because hes from canada isnt NA
WE has Korean imports or at least one.

only took TSM to have the least amount of actual NA players on their roster to finally win something...... If they only could replace Dyrus and Turtle aswell then they might have a fair chance at worlds maybe :)
For the love of the game i hope a fully native team will win worlds no matter what region they r from so one can actually see the identity of the team and not some mixed up BS.

They're an NA team, no matter what people say. They live in NA, they practice on NA servers, they scrim with NA teams. You can't plop a Korean SC2 pro in NA and restrict his access to KR servers and expect him to continue to perform at the same level he did in Korea, same goes for LoL.

How many Koreans did the Almight Yellowstar get for Fnatic? Oh yeah. 2.
3 Koreans and an NA pro as Coach in the top 3 teams of EU LCS...
How many wins did EU teams SK and GMB get in IEM without help from NA/KR/CN? 1 between the both of them. Versus 7 from just TSM (I don't want to bring up C9 cause they played like shit)

hmm. The fact of the matter is that imports are made to bolster teams and players that come over from other regions are case and point from the region they play in.

Stay salty EU fanboy.
Cause TSM is the only team with imports in any region right? Lets also ignore the fact that the foreign players have been refined in NA, and meshed with NA. Stay salty EU
TSM > ALL
I don't even feel like that is trolling. I mean at least this weekend it is true. Technically it is NA>CH>KR>=TWN>EU.
Every league besides EU > NA> EU

If I read this right:

> Every league besides EU is greater than NA which is greater than EU.

So something like this:
KR/CN/SEA/OCE/BR/JP > NA > EU

I don't know how I feel about this. My NA pride meter from IEM Katowice is soaring (even though I hate Reginald with the fury of a thousand suns glaring off his forehead). I can't help but thinking that come MSI or Worlds, KR/CN are going to Roll over NA/EU.
did someone knows where are the TSM skins? i canÂ´t find them :(
Considering China was using their last place team at IEM, and C9 bombed the tourny, it is more like TSM is world class and even China's trash teams can beat Koreans

China wasn't "using" their last place team. WE won IEM Shenzhen. That is how the earned their spot in that tournament. C9 won IEM San Jose. GMB won Cologne. yFW won Taipei.

Those 4 teams earned their spots from the previous IEMs. TSM, GE, SK, and CJ were all brought in because of their standing in their respective regions (with CJ brought in as the second KR team to balance things out).
KR>SEA>EU
